Translations.Text: geuligo deo manh-i bad-eulyeo eunhyeleul bepulji malmyeo
geudaeneun nawa naega holmom-eulo changjohan jaleul noh-adula
naneun geuleul wihae jeulbihan jaesan-eul dueossgo
geuligo naneun geuleul wihae manh-eun geos-eul pyeolchyeo jueossnola
geu huedo geuneun naega deohae jugileul huimanghadeola
geuleohji anhnola. sillo geuneun naui jingpyoe daehae gojibbulineun jayeossnola
naneun geuege godoen beol-i deopchige hal geos-ila
geuleoni geuga jaeneun bangbeob-e jeojuga issnola
dasi hanbeon, geuga jaeneun bangbeob-e jeojuga issnola
geu hu geuneun eolgul-eul jjipuligo jjing-geulyeossnola
geu hu geuneun kkongmunileul ppaemyeo geomanhae hayeossnola
geulihayeo geuga malhagil : "igeos-eun ojig jeonhaejyeo naelyeooneun jusul-il ppun-ila
naneun geuleul tteugeoun buljiog-eulo taeul geos-ila
mueos-i geudaeege tteugeoun buljiog-i mueos-injileul allyeo jul geos-inga

naneun buljiog-ui gwanlijadeul-eul ojig cheonsadeulloman dueoss-eumyeo, naneun geudeul-ui susjaleul ojig bulsinhaneun jadeul-e daehan siheom-eulo dueossnola. geulihayeo seongseoleul bad-eun jadeul-i hwagsin-eul eodgo, midneun jadeul-i mid-eum-i jeung-gadoemyeo, seongseoleul bad-eun jadeulgwa sin-ang-indeul-i uisimhaji anhgi wiham-ila. geuleona ma-eum sog-e byeong-i issneun jadeulgwa bulsinjadeul-eun 'i biyulosseo hananim-i wonhaneun geos-eun mueos-inga?' lago malhadeola. geuleohge hananimkkeseoneun geubunkkeseo wonhasineun jaleul banghwangsikisigo geubunkkeseo wonhasineun jaleul indohasinola. ojig geubunman-i geudae junim-ui gundaeleul algo gyesinola. geugeos(buljiog)eun daleum anin ingan-eul wihan tteoollim-ila
jachwileul gamchul ttaeui bam-eul dugo maengseko
jinsillo geugeos(buljiog)eun eomahan geos jung-ui hanaimyeo
geudaedeul jung-eseo ap-eulo naagageona hog-eun dwilo mulleoseogoja haneun jaleul wihan geos-ila
modeun yeonghon-eun geuga eod-eun geos-eulo jeondang jabhyeo issnola
mueos-i geudaedeul-eul tteugeoun buljiog-e deulge hayeossneunga
geudeul-i malhagil : "ulineun yebae deulineun jadeul-i anieossgo
geuleoni jungjaejadeul-ui jungjaedo geudeul-egeneun soyong-i eobsnola
geuleom-edo geudeul-eun tteoollim-e deung-eul dollineun jadeul-ini i eojji doen il-inga
sillo geudeul jung-ui modeun ineun pyeolchyeojin chaegjaleul badgil wonhadeola
gyeolko geuleohji anhnola! geudeul-eun naeseleul dulyeowohaji anhnola
geudeul-eun ojig hananimkkeseo wonhasil ttaeman tteoollil geos-ila. geubunkkeseoneun gyeong-oesim-eul bad-eusil bun-imyeo yongseoui gwonlileul gajisineun bun-ila
